naslov: Prekrasna vila u Istri s velikom okućnicom i bazenom (prodaja)
opis: Zamislite se kako uživate u tišini istarske prirode, okruženi mirisima šume i zvukom valova s obližnjih plaža. Predstavljamo vam vilu koja je savršena kombinacija tradicionalne istarske arhitekture i modernog dizajna, smještenu u idiličnom selu blizu Duge Uvale. Ključne značajke: * Lokacija: U srcu Istre, samo nekoliko kilometara od trgovina, restorana i kafića, ali dovoljno udaljena da pruži potpunu privatnost i mir. * Prostor: Prostrana parcela od 1500 m2, okružena visokim čempresima koji garantiraju privatnost. * Unutrašnjost: Tri spavaće sobe s vlastitim kupaonicama, prostrani dnevni boravak s kaminom koji se otvara prema vrtu, te moderna kuhinja s blagovaonicom. Svaka prostorija odiše kvalitetom, toplinom i stilom. * Tehnologija: Podno grijanje i hlađenje preko Bosch dizalice topline za vašu udobnost tijekom cijele godine. * Dizajn: Autentični benkovački kamen kojim je oblažen donji dio kuće, dodajući tradicionalni šarm. * Vanjski sadržaji: Grijani bazen, jacuzzi, stolni tenis, biljar i još mnogo toga za vaše sate opuštanja i zabave. * Pomoćna zgrada: 39 m2 prostora s kuhinjom, kaminom, krušnom peći, blagovaonicom, spavaćom sobom i wc-om. Idealno za goste ili obiteljska okupljanja. Ova vila nije samo nekretnina, već prilika za život u skladu s prirodom, u luksuzu koji zadovoljava sve vaše potrebe. Doživite Istru na najbolji mogući način! Udaljenosti: Aerodrom Pula 15 km Trgovina 2.5 km Restoran 2,6 km Plaža 3,5 km Za sva pitanja kontakt telefon 098 / 915 - 5643 ( Ivan ) LORETA NEKRETNINE Loreta Usluge Office: Tel: 01 / 3866 - 844 Zagrebačka avenija 100a, 10 000 Zagreb www.loreta-nekretnine.com Imagine   yourself   enjoying   the   silence   of   Istrian   nature  ,   surrounded   by   the   scents   of   the   forest   and   the   sound   of   waves   from   the   nearby   beaches  . We   present   to   you   a   villa   that   is   a   perfect   combination   of   traditional   Istrian   architecture   and   modern   design  ,   located   in   an   idyllic   village   near   Duga   Uvala  . Key   features  : *   Location  :   In   the   heart   of   Istria  ,   just   a   few   kilometers   from   shops  ,   restaurants   and   cafes  ,   but   far   enough   away   to   provide   complete   privacy   and   peace  . *   Space  : A   spacious   plot   of   1500   m2  ,   surrounded   by   tall   cypresses   that   guarantee   privacy  . *   Interior  : Three   bedrooms   with   en  -  suite   bathrooms  ,   a   spacious   living   room   with   a   fireplace   that   opens   to   the   garden  ,   and   a   modern   kitchen   with   dining   area  .   Each   room   exudes   quality  ,   warmth   and   style  . *   Technology  : Underfloor   heating   and   cooling   via   a   Bosch   heat   pump   for   your   comfort   all   year   round  . *   Design  : Authentic   Benkovac   stone   that   is   lined   with   the   lower   part   of   the   house  ,   adding   a   traditional   charm  . *   Outdoor   Facilities  : Heated   pool  ,   jacuzzi  ,   table   tennis  ,   billiards  ,   and   more   for   your   hours   of   relaxation   and   entertainment  . *   Auxiliary   building  : 39   m2   of   space   with   kitchen  ,   fireplace  ,   bread   oven  ,   dining   room  ,   bedroom   and   toilet  .   Ideal   for   guests   or   family   gatherings  . This   villa   is   not   just   a   property  ,   but   an   opportunity   to   live   in   harmony   with   nature  ,   in   luxury   that   meets   all   your   needs  .   Experience   Istria   in   the   best   possible   way  ! Distance: Pula   Airport   15   km Shop   2  .  5   km Restaurant   2  ,  6   km Beach   3  .  5   km For   all   questions   contact   phone   098   /   915   -   5643   (   Ivan   ) LORETA   REAL   ESTATE Loreta   Services   Office  :   Tel  :   01   /   3866   -   844 Zagrebačka   avenija   100a  ,   10   000   Zagreb www.loreta-nekretnine.com ID KOD AGENCIJE: 294 Ivan Bošković Agent s licencom Mob: 098/9155-643 Tel: 01/3866 844 E-mail: ivan.boskovic@loreta.hr www.loreta.hr
